channel.title: Help with drops!
channel.description: Hey guys i need help with my drops. when i drop somthing it disapears, im trying to have a d party and i can't when drops r off. ive tried ::dropon and ::dropson but those didnt work can someone give me the code command. IT WOULD HELP ALOT! :D PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME!

item.title: Help with drops!
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

check case 87 in client.java. That’s your dropping item case.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with drops!
item.dc:creator: @Massive-PvP Massive-PvP
item.description:
@Massive-PvP wrote:

Dude i couldnt find it… ok i went to client.java and i looked up ("You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + “, it vanishes into the ground.”);

But it didnt find it, so i tried to earase some of it, but it still wouldnt find anything HELP?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with drops!
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

First off, there is no advertising, so I suggest you remove it.

Now, there might be a code stating your player rights in the client class or stating your username.

Open up the server’s client.java, and search (Ctrl + F) for something like:

("You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground.");
Look above that for something like:
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[b]YOUR USERNAME[/b]")) { sM("You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; }
Or,
if (playerRights == [b]YOUR PLAYER RIGHTS NUMBER (0, 1, 2, or 3)[/b]) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; }

If drops disappear for everyone, it could be in itemHandler. Try this first, and let me know what happens. If you still need the code, let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with drops!

item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Or you could remove the link and i wont report you?
